A dangerous NASA heat shield issue has been clarified by the international space union. This detail was claimed by the website called Space Explored.
However, the giant space agency now denies this … [+2540 chars]

articles.title: Artificial intelligence is being used to search for space pebbles - BollyInside
articles.description: Last year, a meteorite was discovered at the remote Kybo Station on the Nullarbor Plain. It’s only 70g – roughly the same as a large egg – and looks
articles.content:
Last year, a meteorite was discovered at the remote Kybo Station on the Nullarbor Plain.
Its only 70g roughly the same as a large egg and looks suspiciously like kangaroo faeces.
Drone imagery of a… [+1993 chars]
